016package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.controller;
017
018import android.os.Bundle;
019import android.util.Log;
020import android.view.LayoutInflater;
021import android.view.Menu;
022import android.view.MenuInflater;
023import android.view.MenuItem;
024import android.view.View;
025import android.view.ViewGroup;
026import android.widget.AdapterView;
027import android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener;
028import android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener;
029import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
030import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
031import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
032import androidx.core.view.MenuProvider;
033import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
034import androidx.lifecycle.Lifecycle.State;
035import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
036import androidx.navigation.NavController;
037import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
038import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
039import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.NavigationGraphDirections;
040import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.R;
041import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.adapter.GuessesAdapter;
042import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.databinding.FragmentGameBinding;
043import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.Team;
044import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
045import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.PermissionsViewModel;
046import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.PreferencesViewModel;
047import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.SportsDBViewModel;
048import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.SportsDBViewModel_Factory;
049import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.UserViewModel;
050
051/**
052 * Demonstrates access to and observation of {@link androidx.lifecycle.LiveData} elements in
053 * {@link LoginViewModel}, {@link UserViewModel}, {@link PermissionsViewModel}, and
054 * {@link PreferencesViewModel}, as well as acting as a navigation placeholder. This fragment can be
055 * used as an example for creating other navigable fragments that access these core viewmodels; it
056 * can then be evolved to provide more application-specific utility, or removed/replaced
057 * altogether.
058 */
059@AndroidEntryPoint
060public class GameFragment extends Fragment implements MenuProvider {
061
062  private FragmentGameBinding binding;
063  private SportsDBViewModel viewModel;
064
065  @Nullable
066  @Override
067  public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
068      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
069    binding = FragmentGameBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
070    binding.guessText.setOnItemSelectedListener(new OnItemSelectedListener() {
071
072      @Override
073      public void onItemSelected(AdapterView<?> parent, View view, int position, long id) {
074        Team selectedTeam = (Team) parent.getSelectedItem();
075        viewModel.submitGuess(selectedTeam);
076      }
077
078      @Override
079      public void onNothingSelected(AdapterView<?> parent) {
080      }
081    });
082
083    binding.guessText.setOnItemClickListener(new OnItemClickListener() {
084      @Override
085      public void onItemClick(AdapterView<?> parent, View view, int position, long id) {
086        Team selectedTeam = (Team) parent.getItemAtPosition(position);
087        viewModel.submitGuess(selectedTeam);
088      }
089    });
090    binding.showScores.setOnClickListener((v) ->
091        Navigation.findNavController(binding.getRoot()).navigate(GameFragmentDirections.navigateToFragmentScores()));
092    return binding.getRoot();
093  }
094
095  @Override
096  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
097    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
098    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(
099        SportsDBViewModel.class);
100    viewModel.getTeams()
101        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (teams) -> {
102          ArrayAdapter<Team> adapter = new ArrayAdapter<>(requireContext(),
103              android.R.layout.simple_dropdown_item_1line, teams);
104          binding.guessText.setAdapter(adapter);
105        });
106    viewModel.getGame()
107        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (game) -> {
108          binding.guessText.setText("");
109          GuessesAdapter adapter = new GuessesAdapter(requireContext(), game.getGuesses());
110          binding.guesses.setAdapter(adapter);
111          if (game.isSolved()) {
112            binding.guessText.setEnabled(false);
113            NavController controller = Navigation.findNavController(binding.getRoot());
114            controller.navigate(GameFragmentDirections.navigateToEndGame());
115          } else {
116            binding.guessText.setEnabled(true);
117          }
118        });
119    requireActivity().addMenuProvider(this, getViewLifecycleOwner(), State.RESUMED);
120  }
121
122  @Override
123  public void onCreateMenu(@NonNull Menu menu, @NonNull MenuInflater menuInflater) {
124    menuInflater.inflate(R.menu.game_options, menu);
125  }
126
127  @Override
128  public boolean onMenuItemSelected(@NonNull MenuItem menuItem) {
129    boolean handled = false;
130    if (menuItem.getItemId() == R.id.new_game) {
131      viewModel.startGame();
132      handled = true;
133    }
134    return handled;
135  }
136
137}
